If unit transforms, grants Atk+2 to unit, inflicts Atk/Def-X on foe during combat (X = number of spaces from start position to end position of whoever initiated combat, + 3; max 6), and also, if X ≥ 5, reduces damage from foe's first attack by 30% during combat.
|required=Adult (Cavalry)
|properties=
